data.description: Interface to IBM LoadLeveler Job Scheduler
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
This module interfaces to the APIs of the LoadLeveler software from
    IBM. LoadLeveler is a batch job scheduling application for clusters
    of servers.

    The namespace of IBM::LoadLeveler is nicely descriptive of the
    module.

    This is a resubmit following advice from Arthur Bergman
